Title: The Aeronauts
Writer: Richard Holmes (inspired by the book 'Falling Upwards' by), Tom Harper (story by), Jack Thorne (story by), Jack Thorne (screenplay by)
Actors: Felicity Jones, Vincent Perez, Phoebe Fox, Lewin Lloyd
Plot: A balloon pilot and a scientist find themselves in a fight for survival while attempting to make discoveries in a gas balloon in the 1860s.
